member.name: T:grensesnitt.Framework.AppliesTo`1
member.summary: Interface that specifies what type the test fixture is a fixture for. The type specified here denotes what interface implementations of will be searched for, from the available assembly sources.

member.name: M:grensesnitt.Framework.AppliesTo`1.SetSubjectUnderTest(`0)
member.summary: Method called by the add-in to set the current test subject instance.
